channel.title: Need help, Please look ^^
channel.description:
Hey all, im running a devolution 5 server, and im adding a whole shitload of drops. but i was wondering, is it possible to go below 1% chance of drop? if i just type 0.5 or 0,5 i get a formatexception. and i dont know where to change the method to make it able to read lower then 1%.
if someone knows this, please tell me ^^
Thanks in common :)
greets

item.title: Need help, Please look ^^
item.dc:creator: @adam321 adam321
item.description:
@adam321 wrote:

i dont think its possible but if it was i think u would put .5 insted of 0.5

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, Please look ^^
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Please don’t use these type of attractive topic titles.
Explain your problem in the title.
For example, you need help on making someone an administrator on your server.
Use an explaining topic title such as ‘I need help on making someone admin on my server’ instead of ‘LOOK HERE PLS’, ‘HELPPPP’, ‘FREE RS CASH IF U LOOK HERE’ etc.
Also using an explaining topic title will get people helping you faster, bad topic titles like I listed above are usually used on spam topics.
People will ignore the content of your topic and will report it.
And most people are even ignoring the bad topic titles and go to an explaining one because they know the problem which is already in the topic title.

Thanks

Read full topic
